attributes.comment:
We are in the process of adopting a child from China. We have already met all of
the requirements of our State to receive the I171 approval. The problem is, our
wait for our child will be longer than we had originally hoped. Maybe 18 months to
two years. This means we will have to go through the approval process at least
one more time. Raising your fees will cost our familly money that we really need
to bring this Child home and give her a loving home. Please take in to
consideration the longer wait times involved with international adoption. Please
decide not to raise your fees! Thank you for allowing me to have a voice.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Tracey A. Crowsey
